topic.title: Digital banking building blocks
topic.shortdesc: Finshape’s main product is a custom Digital Banking solution. “Custom” in this context refers to a specific configuration of the provided building blocks (functional capabilities) combined with developing front-end applications and selected add-ons from scratch. These building blocks are not standalone products but rather DBOS infrastructure elements, DBOS components, connectors (APIs), tools, and applications from which the final product can be assembled.
